subSections.title: Related characters
subSections.text: * {{l|mul|[[干]]}} ''({{w|Simplified Chinese|Simplified form}} when used as an adjective in Chinese)''

subSections.title: Etymology 1
Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[dry]]; [[moistureless]]; [[waterless]]; [[arid]]
#: {{zh-x|我 喉嚨 很 乾{gān}。|My throat feels '''dry'''.}}
#* {{zh-x|自動 提示 補水 功能 可 令 家用 電蒸爐 也 不會 有 煲 乾 水 引發 火警  的 危險。|The ability to automatically remind people to add more water may result in electric household steamers no longer carrying the risk of triggering fire alarms when they become empty.|C-LIT|ref=2015, {{lang|zh|紀曉華《水哥廚房：蒸．好生活》}}[https://books.google.com/books?id=PIRYCgAAQBAJ&pg=PA12&dq=%22%E7%85%B2%E4%B9%BE%E6%B0%B4%22]}}
# to [[dry]]; to [[exhaust]]
# {{†}} to [[neglect]]; to [[snub]]
# {{lb|zh|colloquial}} to [[drain]] one's [[glass]]; [[bottoms up]]
# [[dried up]]; [[exhausted]]; [[drained]]
# {{lb|zh|of voice}} [[dry]] and [[coarse]]
# [[dried]]-up [[food]]
# [[adopted]]; [[adoptive]]; [[foster]]
# [[in vain]]; for [[nothing]]
# [[falsely]]; [[superficially]]
# [[not]] [[sweet]]; [[lacking]] [[sweetness]]

subSections.title: Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{zh-forms|alt=乹}}

From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*m-ka-n||heaven; sky; sun}}. Cognate with {{cog|bo|མཁའ}}, {{m|bo|ནམ་མཁའ||sky; heaven}}.

subSections.title: Definitions
Compounds
subSections.text: {{zh-der|fold=1|*乾乾|*乾元|乾圖/乾图|*乾坤|*乾宅|乾斷/乾断|*乾旦|*乾曜|乾清宮/乾清宫|乾紅/乾红|乾綱/乾纲|*乾象|*乾造|*乾道|*乾陵|*乾隆|*朝乾夕惕|顛乾倒坤/颠乾倒坤}}

subSections.title: Readings
Hanja
subSections.text:
{{ko-hanja|hangeul=[[건]], [[간]]|rv=geon, gan|mr=kŏn, kan}}

# ([[하늘]] 건, ''haneul-''): [[sky]]
# ([[건괘]] 건, ''geon-gwae-''): {{lang|und|sc=Latinx|☷}} or the 1st of the Eight Trigrams ({{lang|und|sc=Latinx|☰☱☲☳☴☵☶☷}} or [[w:Ba gua (concept)|八卦]] ([[팔괘]], ''palgwae''))
# ([[임금]] 건, ''im-geum-''): [[king]]
# ([[마르다|마를]] 건, ''mareul-''): to be [[dry]]

subSections.title: See also
subSections.text:
[[w:Ba gua (concept)|八卦]] ([[팔괘]], ''palgwae'')
    {| class=wikitable |- | 7+0=111+000 (U+2630)* | {{lang|und|sc=Latinx|☰}} | [[乾]] | [[天]] | [[sky]] |- | 6+1=110+001 (U+2631) | {{lang|und|sc=Latinx|☱}} | [[兌]] | [[澤]] | [[marsh]] |- | 5+2=101+010 (U+2632) | {{lang|und|sc=Latinx|☲}} | [[離]] | [[火]] | [[fire]] |- | 4+3=100+011 (U+2633) | {{lang|und|sc=Latinx|☳}} | [[震]] | [[雷]] | [[thunder]] |- | 3+4=011+100 (U+2634) | {{lang|und|sc=Latinx|☴}} | [[巽]] | [[風]] | [[wind]] |- | 2+5=010+101 (U+2635) | {{lang|und|sc=Latinx|☵}} | [[坎]] | [[水]] | [[water]] |- | 1+6=001+110 (U+2636) | {{lang|und|sc=Latinx|☶}} | [[艮]] | [[山]] | [[mountain]] |- | 0+7=000+111 (U+2637) | {{lang|und|sc=Latinx|☷}} | [[坤]] | [[地]] | [[earth]] |} [*] Decimal pair=Binary pair (Codepoint). (The solid bar "—" of the Trigrams may be assigned to the binary number "1", while the split bar "--" to "0".)
